name: My Giraffe Simulator
description:
Game Features
REAL WORLD- Check Your Health,Hunger and Thirst While You Play the Game. This is the Key Point to Survive in the Wild!

PERFECT 3D ENVIRONMENT- You Are in The Wild With Really Amazing Graphics and Huge Environment With Lots of Different Animals!

FIGHT FOR SURVIVAL- Search for Food and Water! Keep Away From Hunters!

NEW CAMERA OPTIONS- With new Camera, You can check around easily!

NEW MINI MAP- With Mini Map its easy to find Food and Water!

EASY TOUCH CONTROLS- Easy to Control your Actions in the Wild!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR HERD- Breed Function Added. Now You Can Have CUBS!

Download Giraffe Simulator now and get your giraffe today!
